sections.heading: and criminal immunity.The members of the board and the board's employees or persons under contract with the board shall be immune from any civil action or criminal prosecution for initiating or assisting in any lawful investigation of the actions of or any disciplinary proceeding concerning a creden
sections.text: and criminal immunity.The members of the board and the board's employees or persons under contract with the board shall be immune from any civil action or criminal prosecution for initiating or assisting in any lawful investigation of the actions of or any disciplinary proceeding concerning a credential holder pursuant to the Real Property Appraiser Act if such action is taken without malicious intent and in the reasonable belief that it was taken pursuant to the powers vested in the members of the board or such employees or persons.SourceLaws 1990, LB 1153, § 25;Laws 1991, LB 203, § 26;Laws 1994, LB 1107, § 21;Laws 2001, LB 162, § 16;Laws 2006, LB 778, § 45;Laws 2010, LB931, § 8.
